shortDescription: The tree list functionality in the photo gallery application in ASUSTOR ADM 3.1.0.RFQ3 has a SQL injection vulnerability that affects the 'album_id' or 'scope' parameter via a photo-gallery/api/album/tree_lists/ URI.
vulnerabilityName: asustor asustor_data_master Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
